name: Eighteen Trivia Quiz | Something in Common | 10 Questions

questions.text:
"Beauty queen of only eighteen."

This is the opening line to which song by Maroon 5?
questions.explanation:
She Will Be Loved.

	"She Will Be Loved" was released by Maroon 5 as a single in 2004. It appeared on their debut album, "Songs About Jane" (2002). Interestingly, Kelly Preston was in the song's music video.

questions.text:
"Two days past eighteen, he was waiting for the bus in his army green."

This song was sung by which country band?
questions.explanation:
Dixie Chicks.

	"Travelin' Soldier" was originally written and recorded in 1996 by Bruce Robinson. In late 2002, the Dixie Chicks covered the song. It was found on their third album, "Home".

questions.text:
"Stuck in her daydream. Been this way since eighteen."

Which singer sang the song "A Team"?
questions.explanation:
Ed Sheeran.

	Ed Sheeran's debut album, released in 2011, was called "+". His debut single from the album, released a few months prior to the album, was called "A Team".

questions.text:
"For me you'll always be eighteen and beautiful."

Lady Antebellum sings this song, which is called what?
questions.explanation:
Dancing Away With My Heart.

	"Dancing Away With My Heart" was released in 2011 by Lady Antebellum. It was found on their third album, "Own the Night".

questions.text:
"Daddy drives an eighteen-wheeler."

Which band sings "Roll On (Eighteen Wheeler)"?
questions.explanation:
Alabama.

	"Roll On (Eighteen Wheeler)" was released by Alabama in 1984. It was the band's twelfth number one, and was on their "Roll On" album (1984).

questions.text:
"I was twenty and she was eighteen."

These are the first words to which Tim McGraw hit?
questions.explanation:
Red Rag Top.

	Tim McGraw released "Red Rag Top" in 2002. It was found on his 2002 album entitled "Tim McGraw and the Dancehall Doctors". Some radio stations banned the song due to the controversial mention of abortion.

questions.text:
"Eighteen wheels and a dozen roses, ten more miles on his four day run."

This is a song by which artist?
questions.explanation:
Kathy Mattea.

	Kathy Mattea released her album "Untasted Honey" in 1987. Her single from the album was released in 1988. It was called "Eighteen Wheels and a Dozen Roses".

questions.text:
"She's only 18, don't like the Rolling Stones."

This is a song by which band?
questions.explanation:
Red Hot Chili Peppers.

	"She's Only 18" was a song released by the Red Hot Chili Peppers in 2006. It was found on their album "Stadium Arcadium" (2006).

questions.text:
"Seven pounds and eighteen inches."

"Eighteen Inches" was released by which "American Idol" star?
questions.explanation:
Lauren Alaina.

	In 2011 Lauren Alaina ("American Idol" season ten runner-up) released her first studio album, "Wildflower". In 2012, one of the songs from the album, "Eighteen Inches", was released as a single.

questions.text:
"I'm eighteen and don't know what I want."

Alice Cooper sings this song, known as "I'm Eighteen". It was released as a single with a slightly altered title. What was it?
questions.explanation:
Eighteen.

	Alice Cooper released their first major label album in 1970. It was called "Love it to Death". Their song, "I'm Eighteen", was their breakthrough hit as a band. It was released as a single in 1970 with the title "Eighteen".
